sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const BookCard = ({ book, onBuy, showEdit, onEdit }) => { return (

{book.title}

ID: {book.id}
ISBN: {book.isbn}
作者: {book.author}
出版社: {book.publisher}
零售价: ¥{book.retail_price.toFixed(2)}
库存: {book.stock_quantity}
更新时间: {new Date(book.updated_at).toLocaleString()}
{showEdit && ( )}
); }; export default BookCard;
